img = Image.open(path)
if isinstance(size, tuple):
    h, w = size[0], size[1]
else:
    h, w = size, size
img = img.resize((h, w))
x = np.array(img, dtype=np.float32)
x[..., 0] -= 123.68
x[..., 1] -= 116.779
x[..., 2] -= 103.939
if BGRTranspose == True:
    x = x[(...), ::-1]
return x
